Source code for massweb.vuln_checks.match

import sys
import requests
import traceback
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup, SoupStrainer


[docs]def match_string(_input, match):

    if match in _input:
        return True

    else:
        return False



[docs]def match_strings(_input, match_list):

    for match in match_list:
        if match in _input:
            return True

    return False



[docs]def parse_match(_input, tag, match):

    for script in BeautifulSoup(_input, 'html5lib').findAll('script'):

        try:
            script_text = script.get_text()
            if match in script_text:
                return True

        except:
            traceback.print_exc()
            continue

    return False


if __name__ == "__main__":

    x = requests.get("http://www.punkspider.org/").text    
#    x = open("oaktree.file.out").read()
    print parse_match(x, "script", "t")
